short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open whatsapp to any phone number

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Open any whatsapp conversation with one click. Just fill the number and start chating. That's it. 

You don't need to find sites to open anything for you. With this extension your life will be simple.
